The entry point of the application.

pizzaProgram.config - package pizzaProgram.config
Package containing utility classes for handling program settings.
pizzaProgram.constants - package pizzaProgram.constants
Package containing various constants, mostly String constants, making for easier translation of the program, and enables easy renaming of tables and columns in the database.
pizzaProgram.core - package pizzaProgram.core
This package contains the entry point of the program, which initializes the main program window.
pizzaProgram.database - package pizzaProgram.database
This package contains the core classes for communicating with the database.
pizzaProgram.database.databaseUtils - package pizzaProgram.database.databaseUtils
This package contains various utility classes for reading from and writing to the database.
pizzaProgram.database.eventHandlers - package pizzaProgram.database.eventHandlers
This package contains classes that listens for read, write and system events.
pizzaProgram.dataObjects - package pizzaProgram.dataObjects
This package contains classes that encapsulates various data from the database, like Dishes, Customers etc.
pizzaProgram.events - package pizzaProgram.events
All the classes comprising the core of the event system is stored in this package.
pizzaProgram.gui - package pizzaProgram.gui
This package contains classes for initialization of the various GUIs.
pizzaProgram.gui.EventHandlers - package pizzaProgram.gui.EventHandlers
This package contains the event handler classes for the GUI.
pizzaProgram.gui.utils - package pizzaProgram.gui.utils
Package containing an utility class used by the DeliveryGUI class.
pizzaProgram.gui.views - package pizzaProgram.gui.views
This package contains classes containing code automatically generated by the NetBeans IDE.
pizzaProgram.modules - package pizzaProgram.modules
This package contains abstract classes that defines functionality for various modules of the program.
pizzaProgram.utils - package pizzaProgram.utils
This package contains tools for formatting data and calculating prices.
